text: læa chay hnum sxng khn (mhadlek) di khea khuk phrxm kab khea hnung nı sxng khn klaw wa thæcring chan fan hen wa chan khan hela læa xik khn hnung klaw wa thæcring chan fan hen wa chan bæk khnmpang wi bn srisʹa khxng chan læw nk di ma kin man cng bxk rea dwy kar thanay fan thæcring rea hen than xyu nı hmu phu thakhwam di
